title: Cheesy bacon, sweetcorn and potato soup
ingredients: ['1.35kg potatoes, peeled and diced', '115g streaky bacon, diced', '120g onion, chopped', '850g tinned creamed style corn', '350ml evaporated milk', '175ml full fat milk', '50g margarine', '225g processed cheese, such as Kraft singles, unwrapped and chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste']
